org.jcatapult.mvc.servlet
Class DefaultMVCWorkflow

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.mvc.servlet.DefaultMVCWorkflow
All Implemented Interfaces:
MVCWorkflow, org.jcatapult.servlet.Workflow
public class DefaultMVCWorkflow
extends Object
implements MVCWorkflow

This class is the main entry point for the JCatapult MVC. It creates the default workflow that is used to process requests.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

perform

public void perform(org.jcatapult.servlet.WorkflowChain chain)
             throws IOException,
                    ServletException
Creates a sub-chain of the MVC workflows and invokes it.

Specified by:
perform in interface org.jcatapult.servlet.Workflow
Parameters:
chain - The chain.
Throws:
IOException - If the sub-chain throws an IOException
